8/9/23, 5:39 PM
NEW
ORLEA
CITY O
LOUISIANA
CRIMINAL JUSTICE COMMITTEE
MEETING MINUTES
WEDNESDAY, JULY 12, 2023
10:00 A.M.
1. Roll Call
Quorum not initially established. Councilmembers Morrell and King joined the meeting
after roll call. Councilmember Green was also present.
Discussion regarding building new Phase III facility at Orleans Parish Justice Center
3.
in accordance with the Cooperative Endeavor Agreement authorized by Ordinance
Calendar No. 34,265. Presenters: Pres Kabacoff, Dr. James Austin, Susan Guidry, Dr.
Jennifer Avegno and John Williams
Phase III Presentation
Funding spreadsheet
Due to an initial lack of quorum, this item was taken out of order, after roll call.
Panel members gave the attached presentation and discussed the history of the Phase III
proposal and their opposition to the design - for reasons of security, mental health
concerns, and cost.
2. Approval of the minutes from the May 10, 2023 Criminal Justice Committee meeting
MOVED BY: JP Morrell
SECONDED BY: Freddie King
ACTION: Approve
YEAS: Oliver M Thomas, JP Morrell, Freddie King - 3
NAYS: 0
ABSENT: Helena Moreno, Lesli D Harris - 2
RECUSED: 0
AND THE MOTION PASSED
4.
Adjournment
Public Comment
